column2: DHT Holdings, Inc. engages in the operation of a fleet of crude oil tankers. The firm's fleet trades internationally and consists of 27 crude oil tankers in the very large crude carriers (VLCC) segment. The firm has all function in-house and operates through integrated management companies in Monaco, Singapore and Oslo, Norway. The Companyâ€™s operating VLCCs has a combined carrying capacity of 8,360,850 deadweight tons (dwt). The firm's VLCCs comprised of DHT Raven, DHT Lake, DHT Condor, DHT Scandinavia, DHT Falcon, DHT Bauhinia, DHT Europe, DHT China, DHT Hawk, DHT Edelweiss, DHT Lotus, BW Peony, DHT Amazon, DHT Redwood, DHT Sundarbans, DHT Opal, DHT Taiga, DHT Jaguar, DHT Leopard, DHT Lion, DHT Panther, DHT Puma, and DHT Tiger.
